name: Uvala Lučice
notes: Well protected bay, short walk to Milna village. Popular in summer — arrive before 2pm.

name: Palmižana Bay
notes: Best beach bar scene on the coast. Crystal clear water. Restaurant Toto's on shore.

name: Stiniva Cove
notes: Voted best European beach. Anchor outside the cove entrance and swim in.

name: Vinogradišće Bay
notes: Turquoise water, Laganini beach bar. More peaceful alternative to Palmižana main bay.

name: Uvala Lovišće
notes: Completely sheltered bay on uninhabited island. Perfect storm refuge. No facilities.

name: Polače Bay
notes: Roman ruins on shore, Mljet National Park 2km. Restaurant on the quay.

name: Uvala Žukova
notes: Quiet bay, 15min walk to Korčula old town. Good holding.

name: Komiža Bay
notes: Charming fishing village. Book Blue Cave trip from here. Open to west — watch forecast.

name: Stončica Bay
notes: Sandy beach, shallow entry. Good for families. Small beach bar in season.

name: Uvala Lučica
notes: Remote paradise on Lastovo nature park. Almost no tourists. Bring supplies.

name: Telašćica Bay
notes: Massive natural harbour inside nature park. Salt lake hike. Restaurant at head of bay.

name: Soline Bay
notes: Near Mljet salt lakes. Buoys available in season. Very peaceful overnight.

name: Srebrna Bay
notes: Silver sand beach, pine trees to shore. One of the best swimming spots on Korčula.

name: Paklina Bay
notes: Close to Hvar town but quieter. Dinghy ride to the nightlife.
